title: New key fragment from honor problem.
body:
First of all hello to evryone who will read this topic. Great love to evryone.

So what is my problem i play League from session 2 so now is session 7, my problem is right now key fragment/honor capsule. I think you are asking what is problem, i love this new Honor system, becous i am loyal riot player, and right now i dont have to much time to play league but, i am asking why i can't get key fragment drop (it's so low drop for me) can you check my account pls, and if is not problem with my account write me what is point of collecting key fragment.

                                                                                        P.S. i am lwl 4 Honor.
                                                                                        Great love to evryone who read this. 
                                                                                        Love to riot ! <3  


{{champion:236}}

replies.body:
Love back at you, friend!  Key fragment drops are random, but the rate of which it drops decreases each time until you obtain 12.  That rate will then reset every ~28 days.  Capsules are also random, and would substitute what could have been a fragment drop.

Our [hextech crafting](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide) guide also has more info too.  Let me know if you have any questions!

Thank you, friend.
Thank you for replay so fast.
Love to you bro ‚ù§
